title: Subway shooting suspect faces terrorism-related charge in federal court - CNN

description: Frank James, the man arrested after a roughly 30-hour manhunt on suspicion of shooting 10 people on a train headed to a Brooklyn subway station Tuesday morning, will make his initial court appearance Thursday, authorities said.
